name: BUMPED!
description:
BUMPED!

This is our submission for the "Amaze me" Game Jam 2021.

BUMPED! it's a fast paced arcade game where you play as a ball trying to reach the goal on every stage, obstacles blocking your path and enemies shooting at you will be the main cause of failure... that combined with a constantly rotating camera that wont let you keep a straight line for the Goal~

Top down 2D games are always fun, specially arcade ones for a quick gaming session, but let's be honest, there is always something about us that keep us wanting some 3D elements in our games, and that's why we decided to combine a bit of both worlds in the looks of  our game.

We really hope you guys enjoy it!

How To Play:

The main goal of the game is just to reach the "Goal" at the opposite corner of each room. Every scenario will be packed with obstacles and monsters to stop the player from completing the game.

Each time you kill a monster, there is a chance to get a little neon ball of the enemie's color, this will grant you a special Skill and those can be your ticket to victory in many situations.

Don't forget to keep an eye out for Hearts, those can replenish your HP and keep you in the game longer.

You can Stack Skills to reset the duration of the ones already used, with smart use of them and some luck you can keep yourself powered up the whole time.

Controls:

W,A,S,D -> Movement

SPACE BAR -> Skill Use

LSHIFT -> Speed Boost

ALT + ENTER -> Full Screen
